name: Full Dry Volume and Texture Spray
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is:A versatile spray that turns up the volume or texture on different styles for an imperfectly perfect, lived-in look and feel..Hair Type:Straight, Wavy, and Curly.Hair Texture:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Heat Protection.Key Benefits:- Instant, revivable, and long-lasting volume and texture.Highlighted Ingredients:- Volumizing + Texturizing Molecule: Delivers long-lasting volume and texture that won’t weigh down hair..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This finishing styler is scientifically engineered to dial up any look and give hair immediate and long-lasting volume, texture, and soft hold in just a few sprays. It is formulated with Living Proof's patented Volumizing + Texturizing Molecule, which is lighter than industry-standard ingredients and increases the space between individual hair fibers for long-lasting volume and texture that won’t weigh down hair. The spray instantly transforms fine, flat, or thin hair while adding major volume, coveted texture, and buildable hold with a lived-in look and feel.
ingredients: -Volumizing + Texturizing Molecule: Delivers long-lasting volume and texture that won’t weigh down hair. .-Blend of Microporous Minerals and Enzymatically Modified Starches: Gives hair lived-in texture and lightly absorbs oil..-Hydrophobic Resins: Provide an instant, buildable, and soft hold that lasts—even in high humidity...Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Alcohol Denat., VP/VA Copolymer, VA/Crotonates/Vinyl Neodecanoate Copolymer, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Water/Aqua/Eau, Cyclodextrin, Zeolite, Fragrance (Parfum), Ethylcellulose, Propylene Glycol Dibenzoate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Ammonium Glycyrrhizate, Linalool, Citronellol, Citral, Limonene...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Before each spray, shake can well. .-Hold can six to 10 inches away from dry hair. .-Lift a section of hair and apply root to tip. .-Tousle hair with your fingers. .-Repeat until desired style is achieved, shake can between each spray. .-Spray on finished styles for extra texture and hold. .-Tips and tricks: Tip head sideways or upside down and spray product in small bursts throughout lengths for more texture... Recycling Instructions:.-This product is recyclable through TerraCycle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: That product works !! Big volume and « clean » haïr after using it. Only thing is i dont like the FLORAL smell.
